DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the clinical characteristic of recurrent acute rhinosinusitis in children.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Characteristic of Recurrent Acute Rhinosinusitis in Children
DOC.criteria: Children the age less than 15 years with recurrent acute rhinosinusitis who are attending the pediatric allergy clinic during Jan 2010 Dec 2012. Children who had lost medical record.
